item.description:
Cribbage is fun and so are we :)
Come on down to learn, to skunk, to win, to lose and just have F*U*N* in general!
Food is great, people are terrific, and wait till you see the toilet bowl cribbage board ! ! !
Along with the four player, three player, two player, 29 boards also ! !

We had a baker's dozen last night (June 29) including at least four (4) brand newbies and just because I beat them (just a little) I am truly hoping they will return to skunk me ! (fat chance of that)
And poor Rachel, who DID come back beat someone else (but not me yet). Great to see Bette, Emad, Larry and Joe (who are oldies, but goodies) return, missed Y'ALL!!!

It was so much G*R*E*A*T FUN last night, thanks ALL ! !
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back room with our cribbage boards at the ready ! !
item.name: Waltham Cribbage Meetup: Welcome to July !!
